__e: I didn't know she had a sister, but yesterday she introduced Carmen.
You've instructed them on the work to be done in the factory and on the roof?
Well, yes. You live in that big house, your father, the factory and all.
Then one day, at the factory where he worked, he found a friend. A special friend. Someone who understood because he was like him.
In one night you can earn more than in four weeks in the factory.
Hey, is this the correct way?
The way he was cutting throats at the plant it might have been a number of people.
Sure. I don't know how long it takes to get to this plant... and I don't wanna be late the first day.
Look at that. what kind of a factory is this anyhow?
The factory...the factory... it'll fold without you?
I'll ask at the factory. They may know something.
Especially as she was getting less than half what the blokes at the factory was getting for doing the same work.
It wouldn't be any different if the factory did something else.
And the plant that you work for,
Better to stay outside all day and night! Rather than work at the factory!
Unless you're prepared to give me $5 million to build my new factory, it won't be.
Even if... even if they shut down the factory,... they've guaranteed...
